Title: Two Piece Lace Bodice Evening Dress

----

Featured-image: CK35-off-white-two-piece-lace-bodice-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A two piece with a lace appliqued bodice studded with jeweled rhinestones and pearls. The scalloped midriff is accented with the illusion neckline and back. The satin full skirt is trimmed at the midriff with the same rhinestones and beadwork.
